entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiple dispose called for chained dependency injection - Is it actual a bug? #97475
  • ./build.sh --test fails to find 'xunit.console.dll' #97470
  • Segmentation fault on .NET 6 - Linux Ubuntu 18.04 #97467
  • Expression.Lambda() performance degradation and system outage with over 16 arguments #97466
  • Expose WASM Hot Reload capabilities via `.props` file for consumption by `dotnet watch` #97462
    9.0.0
  • ICorDebugFunction5::DisableOpimizations causes target app to be terminated on Linux #97461
  • Regex evaluation bug - discrepancy between compiled and non-compiled regex #97455
    9.0.0
  • Implementation of Runtime Interceptors for Enhanced Development in .NET #97453
  • ARM32 (and possibly some others) might take locks in Interlocked FCalls #97452
  • [browser] Support AppContext switches on runtime #97449
    9.0.0
  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient correct way to avoid sending SNIs #97444
  • [NativeAOT] Publish NativeAOT Got Dependency Error #97442
  • [browser][MT] RangePartitionerTests.RunPartitionerStaticTest_SingleChunking timeout #97440
    9.0.0
  • GC/API/Refresh/Refresh failing in outer loop runs #97437
  • Stateful interop marshallers cannot be copy free on both managed and unmanaged side #97435
  • [API Proposal]: GC level ObjectPooling APIs and more #97434

Closed

  • `InlineArray` size validation does not handle all cases #95193
  • Update some of NativeAOT's uses of Lock to use non-alertable waits #97105
    9.0.0
  • Custom JsonConverter for Dictionary<string. object> #97478
  • Native AOT Testing Improvements #79316
    9.0.0
  • How to have System.Text.Json skip properties of types that are not serializable? #97472
  • Feature switch with ILLink substitution does not always trim branches #90034
    9.0.0
  • Performance regression on ASP.NET #97406
  • Too large individual GC pause (~ 4 minutes) while total memory isn't large #97018
  • JIT does not recognize typeof(X) == o.GetType() checks as intrinsics with R2R #97134
  • AsnWriter.WriteObjectIdentifier permits invalid sub identifier #97419
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensor test failures on CoreCLR #97297
    9.0.0
  • Reading in Stream from ZipPackagePart results in incomplete read of file #97431

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Remove Mono Android Device Startup testing from performance testing. #97484
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve performance of Order{By}{Descending}(...).First/Last #97483
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • mark-ro-instrumentation #97482
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Late cast expansion: delete expansion in importer #97480
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add additionalSize for the DisableOptData #97479
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move AppWithCustomEntryPoints ond ComponentWithNoDependencies to pre-built test assets #97477
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add additionalSize for the DisableOptData #97476
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [JsonSerializer] Add support for out-of-order metadata reads. #97474
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Allow users passing FILE_FLAG_BACKUP_SEMANTICS as FileOptions #97471
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove helper frames #97469
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Allow TernaryLogic to optimize down to BlendVariableMask where appropriate #97468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add build analysis config file to runtime #97465
    needs-area-label
  • Fix handling of capture groups inside of negative lookarounds #97463
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Cleanup dspRegMask to allow sharing the main loop #97459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tweak Enumerable.ToArray to reduce some overheads #97458
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT: Merge fgRemoveConditionalJump and fgOptimizeBranchToNext #97456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump to new Ubuntu 22.04 queue for PPC64 #97451
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not use AllocHGlobal in Pkcs12Reader #97447
    area-System.Security
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE_DD_2A & SVE_DG_2A #97446
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] GCC crosscompile fixes #97445
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] Kill abandoned JSWebWorker threads during mono_exit #97441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Restrict Refresh test platforms #97439
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HW_4A` to `SVE_IU_4A_C` #97433
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove HELPER_METHOD_FRAMEs from built-in marshalers #97432
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • enforce FIELD_OFFSET_LAST_REAL_OFFSET size limit for InlineArrays #97403
    breaking-change, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Updating Vector<T> to support opt-in 512-bit widths #97460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add an internal mode to `Lock` to have it use non-alertable waits #97227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Don't copy runner to test output during regular builds" #97454
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Late cast expansion: more improvements #97387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Enumerable.Range to support Vector<int>.Count <= 16 #97464
    area-System.Linq
  • Remove the concept of packable fields from EEClass #96699
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] update owners #97329
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi/wasm] EmccCompile.cs: quote the compiler path #97427
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Initial provisions for semantic Crossgen2 PDB validation #97090
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Fix decode_value_compute_size #97418
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/9.0-preview1] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter: Fix over-alignment of .eh_frame entries #97457
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview1] [wasi/wasm] EmccCompile.cs: quote the compiler path #97428
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][mono][debugger] Debugger improvements on .net8 #97160
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • Remove remaining references to obsolete JIT configuration variables #97438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update SystemDataSqlClientVersion from 4.8.5 -> 4.8.6 #97430
    needs-area-label
  • Ensure that TYP_MASK locals are properly tracked and have correct info in the JIT dump #97422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert isExactType check to JIT/EE interface call #97424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the definition of TARGET_BROWSER in CMake #97254
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, os-browser
  • Fix source_file bug in mono_ppdb_lookup_location_internal #97392
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Validate sub-identifier when encoding ObjectIdentifier #97420
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, 9.0.0
  • Fix XML docs in TimeProvider #97450
    needs-area-label
  • Fix handling of loop alignment targets #97367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable CreateBroadcasting_AllMethodsOverridden test for native AOT #97436
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] Decrease frequency of chrome version bumps #97373
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests dispose threads #97390
    arch-wasm, area-Extensions-Logging, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Specify higher equality tolerance for ReciprocalEstimate tests #97332
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Properly display `BBJ_COND` true and false targets in `dspKind()` #97425
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes GCToOSInterface::GetCurrentProcessId #97429
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use TensorPrimitives.ElementWiseSelect instead of ConditionalSelect in more places #97282
    area-System.Numerics
  • Refresh Test #91833
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #97365
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Move PendingTypeLoadTable from the ClassLoader object to a global structure #96653
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] enable more tests #97391
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Linux/ARM bring-up (4/n) #97269
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve call args interference checking when stores are involved #97409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change the now Deprecated TEST_BIG_ENDIAN to CMAKE_C_BYTE_ORDER #97426
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clean up gtCloneExpr #97411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: initial support for reinforcement learning of CSE heuristic #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO-MERGE] PR benchmark playground #95142
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Convert Array.CopySlow to managed #97202
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono]: Add support for callee saved XMM registers on Windows x64. #97326
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Proposed fix for issue #93189. #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Added designated output instruction emitters #96741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CZ_4A to IF_SVE_CZ_4A_L group #97393
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-arm64-sve
  • Set FlagNetStandard1XDependencies=true and fix issues #96795
    needs-area-label
  • NativeAOT: Inline tls access on linux/x64 #97413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix: unmanaged memory leak on parsing ill-formed certificates #93647
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix DangerousAddRef usage #97394
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #97351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Hash code tests cleanup #97299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, test-enhancement
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in crosgen2 for risc-v #97368
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][mt] Run all tests #97270
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wip][browser] Refactor AssertFilesOnDisk function to check subset of files #97031
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Enable R2RDump #97156
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add clrgcexp to NetCoreApp #97401
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
